name: Kaveh
desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Burst Scan</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Burst Scan</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Before either side chooses their action:</color> If your side has Dendro Core or Bountiful Core, -1 to their <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> , and <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> the card at the top of your deck. After this, deal <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> equal to the original Elemental Dice Cost of the card you <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> ed.
<color=#ffffff>Usage</color> <color=#ffffff>(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 3 <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Mehrak's Assistance</color> , creating 2 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Burst Scan</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Mehrak's Assistance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG, and the <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> they deal is converted to <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Create a <color=#ffffff>Burst Scan</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Burst Scan</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Before either side chooses their action:</color> If your side has Dendro Core or Bountiful Core, -1 to their <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> , and <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> the card at the top of your deck. After this, deal <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> equal to the original Elemental Dice Cost of the card you <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> ed.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)

Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
[ <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"A game of cards is great every once in a while — let's unwind and forget all our worries!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Kaveh's deck contains large numbers of Location Cards with high costs. He can play Location Cards normally to obtain advantages, or he can use "Kaveh"'s Skills to discard high-cost cards from his Deck to deal lots of DMG.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

customize.name: The Art of Budgeting
customize.desc:
Kaveh: The Art of Budgeting

"Feast your eyes!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: The Art of Budgeting
customize.desc:
Kaveh: The Art of Budgeting

"Feast your eyes!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Urk. It isn't easy to predict the outcome of these games... I'll have to up my game. Time to switch tactics!"
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Kaveh" starts with the Talent Card "The Art of Budgeting" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Kaveh: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: The Art of Budgeting
value.desc:
Kaveh: The Art of Budgeting

"Feast your eyes!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Kaveh to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Kaveh
value.desc: A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.
